dc_title_s: A map of America: according to ye newest and most exact observations; by Herman Moll, geographer.
dc_description_s: Vol. III outside upper left margin; "p. 155" outside upper right margin. The state of California is depicted as an island. From Moll's "Forty-two new maps of Asia, Africa, and America" published 1716. 1 map; 27 x 19 cm. This map is in the public domain. Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library.
